definitions.definition: Extremely conservative ; opposing revolution (such as the French Revolution ); favoring a return to a golden age of the past.
Of, pertaining to, participating in , or inducing a chemical reaction .
In reaction to; as a result of.

main_definition: ( politics ) Extremely conservative ; opposing revolution (such as the French Revolution ); favoring a return to a golden age of the past.
secondary_definitions: ( chemistry ) Of, pertaining to, participating in , or inducing a chemical reaction .
In reaction to; as a result of.
